text: Sean Burke (born January 29, 1967) is a Canadian retired NHL goalie. He played 18 seasons in the NHL. He is a 3-time All-Star in the NHL. He announced his retirement on September 18, 2007. He was born in Windsor, Ontario, and grew up in Toronto, Ontario. ==Other websites== * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian ice hockey goaltenders Category:Olympic silver medalists for Canada Category:Carolina Hurricanes players Category:Florida Panthers players Category:Hartford Whalers players Category:Los Angeles Kings players Category:New Jersey Devils players Category:Ice hockey people from Windsor, Ontario Category:Philadelphia Flyers players Category:Phoenix Coyotes players Category:Sportspeople from Ontario Category:Springfield Falcons players Category:Tampa Bay Lightning players Category:Vancouver Canucks players Category:International Hockey League (1945â€“2001) players Category:Ontario Hockey League players
